needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Prosciutto is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: A group of 10 people within a large organization is not the "secret ingredient" needed to build the perfect pizza, but rather a group of groups, where each group is arranged in a tree structure, with each manager representing a single person, and the freedom of action is shared only among the members of the same level.
